abilities.name: Grasping Hands
abilities.description: The animated corpses trapped in a Cadaverous Barricade grab at any living creature that comes too close.
abilities.effect: Enemy units cannot use Run or Retreat abilities while they are within this Manifestation's combat range. In addition, if an enemy unit is picked to use a Move ability while it is within this Manifestation's combat range, halve that unit's Move characteristic (rounding up) for the rest of the turn.
